lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because:
My husband and I have a very comfortable life here in Chicago.
I am a breast, skin and ovarian cancer survivor.  I love to travel and have met many wonderful people in this world. We are on a very small, wonderful planet, the only inhabited so we should love one another and spread peace and wealth for good things not bad.  The western way of life is not necessary the best. Make everyones "home" a place of peace, prosperity and free.
lenders.occupational_info: I usually am at home.  I do try to go to my old job at a family owned, small jewelry store near my home to assist customers and help with paper work and most importantly be out with people.  No life is whole without others.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Nothing gives me more pleasure than helping those wanting to help themselves.  If I can make one person's life better by giving a meer $25! WOW!Nothing could feel better than that!
lenders.occupational_info: I've got the best job in the world if you ask me.  Mainly I help people  buying or selling homes by making it as easy as possible. It can be a stressful time, so my husband & I do the best we can to make it fun.  We live in an incredible area of Canada so a good portion of the people moving here come from all over the world which makes it all the more fun for us too. Now that's what I call Win/Win

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I'll put my $25 where my mouth is!

lenders.name: Bohdan

lenders.name: Ochuko
lenders.loan_because: It's my widow's mite and I believe it'll affect lives positively and put smiles on faces.:)
lenders.occupational_info:
My main job involves me working with ATMs(these are machines that pay you money when you go to the bank or shopping malls instead of human tellers/cashiers).

My other job involves me making images(taking pictures) with a camera. I do this as a hobby and for money too.

I also help hospitals in developing countries to harness the potentials of IT in improving healthcare delivery, reducing cost and improving the overall well-being of the people.

lenders.name: joanne
lenders.loan_because: My immigrant grandfather, who was blind and had no money, started a little store to try to help his family. I wish these entrepreneurs the best.

lenders.name: Troy
lenders.loan_because: Once upon a time there was a wise man who used to go to the ocean to do his writing. He had a habit of walking on the beach before he began his work. One day he was walking along the shore. As he looked down the beach, he saw a human figure moving like a dancer. He smiled to himself to think of someone who would dance to the day. So he began to walk faster to catch up. As he got closer, he saw that it was a young man and the young man wasn't dancing, but instead he was reaching down to the shore, picking up something and very gently throwing it into the ocean. As he got closer he called out,"Good morning! What are you doing?" The young man paused, looked up and replied, "Throwing starfish in the ocean." "I guess I should have asked, why are you throwing starfish in the ocean?" "The sun is up and the tide is going out. And if I don't throw them in they'll die." "But, young man, don't you realize that there are miles and miles of beach and starfish all along it. You can't possibly make a difference!" The young man listened politely. Then bent down, picked up another starfish and threw it into the sea, past the breaking waves and said, "It made a difference for that one."

lenders.name: Johane
lenders.loan_because: I believe in partnering with my neighbors.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise money for a non-profit agency.

lenders.name: Lucas
lenders.loan_because: I feel satisfied when I make differences

My clients are mostly small business men and women and I take care of their bookkeeping and tax affairs. Other clients need help to complete tax returns, and I deal with their tax affairs also.

lenders.name: SERAFIN
lenders.loan_because: I need to raise enough operating capital to open a Restaurant at the center of our town to have maximum access to more buyers of our food product, which is called "LOMI-Batangas".
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a sole proprietor, of Lomi-Batangas outlet in our home for almost 1 year. I am open to teach the "technology" on how to cook this Chinese cuisine.  The Canton noodle is home-made and cannot be bought in the market that is why it is not salty. The sauce is sticky using flour, and it is shining like gold after cooking.
The toppings are bologna, pork liver, pork meat or kikiam.  Soy sauce, garlic-chili sauce and calamansi/lemon are added to improve its taste.  Almost 95% of our customers are coming back to eat and taste again this instant noodle. I hope I can demonstrate how to cook this food to other aspiring Entrepreneurs to help them introduce new product in their domestic market.

There are so many people in the developed world that feel they can't make a difference. This site makes a difference and reaches out to people directly! I'm grateful to Kiva for the opportunity to do this and I'm going to recommend Kiva to everyone I know.

Buddha

lenders.occupational_info: I am a computer technician work at IKON. www.ikon.com is my company. Nice to meet you.

lenders.name: Teresa
lenders.loan_because: I know what a difference it makes to give someone a chance at independence and success.  I love this Kiva program and tell all my friends about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a 9 to 5 girl, but I'm blessed in that I can pay my bills and live in relative freedom and peace.  I hope to give other people a chance for the same.

lenders.name: Monika
lenders.loan_because: I am so thankful for everything that I have been blessed with and I want to share those blessing with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a freely available to the public scientific resource, the Mouse Genome Database. This database contains a wealth of information for scientists on mouse research. I am also working on a Masters in Public Health degree.

lenders.name: Deanne
lenders.loan_because: We in the West are so privileged.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English Language and Literature to students aged 11-18.

lenders.name: marco
lenders.loan_because: penso che quello che questo sito e il premio nobel facciano sia esportare democrazia in tutto il mondo,la democrazia secondo me è dare le stesse possibilità a tutti ,indipendentemente da ogni altra considerazione,per me il potere dare anche solo una possibilità a chi ha una idea,una iniziativa è un segnale di ottimismo nei confronti dell'uomo e della sua voglia di riscatto

lenders.name: Maryam
lenders.loan_because: I like see dreams come true.

lenders.name: Dennis & Hilary
lenders.occupational_info:
I am employed by local government to work with children in a residential unit in Inverness - a great job, but somewhat stressful at times. 

I also work as a volunteer for a children's charity called Chernobyl Children Life Line. We fund and invite children from Belarus to visit the Scottish Highlands. They all come from areas contaminated by the fallout from the Chernobyl nuclear power station disaster of 1986. The children stay in the Highlands for one month to improve their health and experience lots of fun - great children!

Chernobyl Children Life Line website is: www.chernobyl-childrens-charity.co.uk    

Please take a look - there are some excellent photos on the 'media' page.

lenders.name: Mike Hart
lenders.loan_because: Starting my own business was hard, but it is nothing compared to the astonishing stories I have been reading here. Looking through kiva.org makes me realise how lucky I really was, and how I can help others facing far harder problems (and with none of the resources I had) by sacrificing just a few percent interest, and accepting a small risk.
lenders.occupational_info: Based in England, I sell computer cables and accessories to UK and European customers.

lenders.name: The Donah Family
lenders.occupation: HR Manager in a non-profit organization.
lenders.loan_because:
We want to help provide better options to those who are working hard to better their lives and have a positive impact in their communities.
Our loans also express our gratitude to God for providing for us and as an expression of our faith. 

We are also outraged because we know  there are those who exploit others in developing communities by charging unfair interest rates and unethical loan practices.  We want to help provide better options!

We challenge others to join with us
lenders.occupational_info: Wife is an HR manager at a non-profit human services organization.  Husband is a mover (moves furniture and goods for businesses and households).

lenders.name: Erick
lenders.loan_because: it's better than not loaning.

lenders.name: Bette (Mary W.)
lenders.loan_because: God and I made a bargin. God came through for me, so now it's my pleasure to come through for others.
lenders.occupational_info: As a retired person, I'm free to work on behalf of the marginal people crossing our borders.

lenders.name: Deon
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs to try and heal the world by providing wealth to all. Remember we are all one.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an oil field engineer in the province of Alberta in Canada in what we call the oil patch.

lenders.name: Sanity
lenders.loan_because: I got where I am today because people invested in me, so I would like to invest in others.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a company that is building a website which will help people find news and information of interest to them.

lenders.name: Wolfgang and Coree
lenders.loan_because: ... it would be irresponsible not to!  We are grateful for our good health, family, friends and and home.  We are VERY fortunate compared to some of our neighbors in the world and we want to make a positive difference in their lives.  We wish all loan recipients Success and Good Fortune!
lenders.occupational_info: Our work is "happy work"!  =)

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: dawa
lenders.loan_because: I want to invest my money and at the same time,I want to use the money those who really needs..
lenders.occupational_info: enthusiastic

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: Because I think it's cool to have a connection with someone in another country.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a media relations person -- in Commonwealth countries, I'd be called a press officer. I work for a major university.

lenders.name: Celeste
lenders.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva gift certificate and I am continuing to reloan.  I love helping others.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: It's great to see people trying to rise above poverty to help themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: marie-patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people have a better future.

lenders.name: storyofstone
lenders.loan_because: I can make a small difference in this world to help someone who is in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy books, music, films, and travel.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help another entrepreneur find the resources they need.

lenders.name: Ninya
lenders.loan_because: This is a brilliant way to make a positive contribution toward enhancing life for others in harder circumstances than my own.  I hope my small loans, combined with those of others, will help people in developing nations become financially secure and happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct research in fields of tobacco control and food marketing, to help reduce the harms caused by smoking tobacco and unhealthy diets.

lenders.name: Wendy & Tom
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to learn about other cultures and make a difference in a personal way.
lenders.occupational_info:
Wendy: Business Change & Project Management Consultant- Helping organizations plan for and implement change. 
Tom: ESPN - Database support and subject matter expert for X Games and 2010 World Cup Soccer in South Africa.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in giving back to humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses navigate government regulations.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.occupational_info: We are a ranch family and raise Angus, Hereford, and Registered Longhorn cattle in Oklahoma on the Cimarron River.

lenders.name: St. Andrews Students
lenders.loan_because: Our English teacher gave us $20 seed money and told us we should find a way to make a difference in the world with this money.  We could add to the amount but only if we earned the money.  Between the five us us we made an extra $30.  We decided to invest this money with Kiva and it's clients.  We will continue to reinvest our money for other clients of Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: School Project to make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Kane
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me get to where I am today.  Why not return a favor to someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a Network Administrator for a school district in Colorado.

lenders.name: Chris & Cath
lenders.loan_because: We both love the idea of being able to help those who are less fortunate than ourselves.

lenders.name: Sumita and Vipul

lenders.name: Fiona

lenders.occupational_info: I worked in the mental health field all my life.  Sonja was a handicapped learner specialist.

lenders.loan_because: I do business of garments & doing this i need money.So interested person can give me a loan
lenders.occupational_info: I buy stock of garments & export them worlwide.When a buyer asked for a product then i want to buy those for my buyer & export those products, but i have no money but have buyer,For this reason i need money

lenders.name: kat & anirban
lenders.loan_because: That's what our inner voice tells us to.
lenders.occupational_info: I design computer networks.

lenders.name: David 1
lenders.loan_because: I travel and appreciate how lucky we are. KIVA lets us assist the less fortunate in the world, not by handouts, but by giving them a chance to progress. It is not for me, anyone else, or nation, to dictate how another society should be run. However an independant loan, to an individual, will allow that individual to have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Making the2012 olympics safe

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I think that this a really good idea - small businesses often only need small amounts to thrive. Bypassing the banks will force them to change in the longer term.
lenders.occupational_info: Serial Entrepreneur; Consultant

lenders.name: Jeffrey Henderson
lenders.loan_because: If we wait around for governments then it will be a long time. They do what they can, but together we can all do what we can. Kiva helps those who help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a business who also teaches university studies.

lenders.name: Bruno
lenders.loan_because: "One day our grandchildren will go to museums to see what poverty was like" (Muhammad Yunus, The Independent, 1996)
lenders.occupational_info: Design and implement next generation networks

lenders.name: Françoise
lenders.loan_because: it's a pleasure to help people who work hard and to participate in their endeavour to have a better life.
lenders.occupational_info:

and I travel a lot.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I think economic self-sufficiency is  the quickest way to world peace.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: everybody in the world should have the opportunity to realize their dreams and create a better life for their families.

lenders.name: Dariusz

lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students.

lenders.loan_because: Loaning for good causes is a step towards sustainability.
lenders.occupational_info: I work every day with people on concepts, projects, ideas and dreams and I make sure to offer guidance to the best of my capacities.

lenders.loan_because: I buy and sell all the time and know how many problems you can encounter when setting up in buisness. I would now like to take this chance and help people and give them the chance that they deserve to get their own buisness up and running.
lenders.occupational_info: I guess i am lucky enough to have a full time job and on the side have a small part time job as well,  however the time has now come for me to give a little back to the people who really need a chance and hopefully i can make a difference to their lives.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe we each need a little hand at some point in our lives...

lenders.loan_because: We love to help people all around the world. It's great to see people working to improve their lives and help their families.

lenders.name: Vernon Flynn
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to help people to help themselves.

lenders.name: Emilie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others in order to survive.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I´ve understood, that from a certain level of wealth, more money does´nt make you happier any more. But you can give happiness to others by helping. The western society has achieved so much wealth - now it is our obligation to give others a chance too. Kiva offers a great platform for this.
lenders.occupational_info: I´m a private asset manager. I´m managing investments, assets, money of my clients by placing it on the swiss banking place on a fiduciary basis.

lenders.name: Owen
lenders.loan_because: I think its a great way to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: I am looking for creative opportunities in Brasil.

lenders.name: J, B, P, O & H
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others in less fortunate circumstances.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: it is a great honor to help those who wish to pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a university during the day and in the evenings I dye wool, spin yarn, and weave.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to support a program, where the goal is to help people who are willing to work their way out of poverty.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupation: Mom of Twins & Martial Arts School Owner
lenders.loan_because: There are so many ways to help others in this world and most of us simply do not.  We need to give in order to receive! If every celebrity in Hollywood or NY would stop and give a little of themselves instead of buying a $200 pair of jeans or a $3000 handbag we wouldn't have as much poverty as we do in the world today.  I am a small business owner myself and know how hard it is to make it each month.  I want to give because that is what we are meant to do.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband Louis and I own a martial arts school.  We teach adults and children how to defend themselves physically but also try to give them skills that they will need to develop as a person.  Teaching respect for themselves and others, teaching self control, weight management, boosting their self confidence.  Teaching them most importantly, we think, how to become a great Leader.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I feel so lucky to live in an area where I don't have to worry about basic necessities.  I want to help other people feel safe and raise their families successfully to contribute to a better world community.
lenders.occupational_info: I help women empower themselves by teaching them to listen to their bodies, enrich their relationships and even start their own businesses.

lenders.name: Francis
lenders.loan_because: I am living such a privileged life because of my parents’ hard-work and care.  I want to help create opportunities so all children can grow up with similar privileges and have the ability to access education.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because:
"we must be the change we want to see in the world" 
~Mahatma Gandhi~

lenders.name: Typozay.co.uk
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lamont
lenders.loan_because: They need the liquidity
lenders.occupational_info: I make thousands of computers work correctly.

lenders.name: Rhys
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves. People have helped me along my travels and I think it's great to be able to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a small company that creates audio equipment for museums. I spend a lot of time working on our projects, I enjoy what I do and love the excitement of coming up with new ideas.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is wonderful and helps change the lives of many pro-active but disadvantaged people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find new homes.

lenders.name: Steffen and Spiritas
lenders.loan_because: We like to give people a chance to improve their lives. We help people who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Steffen is working in an insurance company helping to make it easier for people to get insurance. Spiritas is teaching law at an university.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people to help themselves

lenders.name: ally
lenders.loan_because: I feel it is everyone's responsibility to do what they can to help others around the globe; we're all in this together.  It heartens me to know that any contributions made will benefit the everyday lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a senior in college at The University of Alabama, (Alabama, USA).  I'm studying Public Relations and I am working as a bartender.

lenders.name: Kern
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity to help others who are trying to help themselves strikes me as something that you just shouldn't pass up. I have been fortunate to have never experience poverty, want or need, as much through the circumstances of my birth as through hard work and commitment. It is nice to be able to put 100% of the money I can lend to practical use. I am grateful that my good fortune can be put to use through Kiva to help people build security for themselves and others. There is, of course, a spiritual appeal to this project as well. My faith in God encourages faith in others and a belief that we are all one family. I am glad that I have found Kiva so I can help my “family” around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that specializes in software for the printing and publishing industry. I have also written a history book about the small town that I currently call home, which was published in 2006.

lenders.name: Pinkie
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people in developing countries, especially Ghana.

lenders.name: Carol & Bill
lenders.loan_because: we believe it can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Carol works in graphics and Bill owns a design company.

lenders.name: MADS from MYC4
lenders.loan_because: The best way out of poverty is business
lenders.occupational_info: An entrepreneur building infrastructures in the digital-, printed and physical worlds with the purpose to eradicte poverty in Africa once and for all

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled to be able to help in a small way; my faith teaches that we all should help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: The doctor records his comments about the x-ray or MRI or CT into a computer that writes it out. I listen to that recording and change the  written report anywhere the computer got it wrong, checking all the facts and making sure everything is correct. Then I send the report to the patient's own doctor.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because:
I believe we can improve the world  by improving one life at a time.



"In a real sense all life is inter-related. All persons are caught in an inescapable network of mutuality, tied in a single garment of destiny. Whatever affects one directly affects all indirectly. I can never be what I ought to be until you are what you ought to be, and you can never be what you ought to be until I am what I ought to be. This is the inter-related structure of reality."

 ~Rev. Martin Luther King, Jr.

lenders.name: Cédric
lenders.loan_because: If several people can help one person in a world to make a dream come true , why hesitate ?
lenders.occupational_info: I'm technician in a laboratory , I analyse some parts of pharmaceutical drugs

lenders.name: Filippo
lenders.loan_because: One small step for man, one giant leap for mankind
lenders.occupational_info: I’m a student in Geography and History.

lenders.name: Vital
lenders.loan_because: I think the best way for the humanity is the share international

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering women...
lenders.occupational_info: I help people align their investments with their values

lenders.name: Kelcey
lenders.loan_because: I cannot keep my blessings to myself.

lenders.name: Kim Rene
lenders.loan_because: It´s a brilliant idea to sponsor local business this way! You can track the developement, and it´s great to do a difference...
lenders.occupational_info: I make a living out of lending money to corporate clients in Denmark.

lenders.name: Guillaume
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and micro-credits. Good luck with your business guys ...
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the manufacturing division of a company making medicines.

lenders.name: Siren
lenders.occupation: I am a terapeut - educated preeschool teacher

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because: Kiva borrowers are more industrious and entrepreneurial than I'll ever be and I have an immense amount of admiration for that. So, the least I can do is get off my big fat ass and press a button to lend some money!

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people take control of their own lives and I believe in the power of the Internet to connect people and create new communities that can improve the world
lenders.occupational_info: I run a non-governmental organization that works to make sure that the Internet is a tool for democracy and freedom around the world.

lenders.name: kristoph
lenders.loan_because: I like the ability to lend directly to a person and be able to track their progress.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies/landlords buy, sell and lease their office space.

lenders.name: HLMH
lenders.loan_because: People helping people makes the world a better place to live!

lenders.name: Jacques and Celine
lenders.loan_because: shortly after arriving in America, 36 years ago, a perfect stranger co-signed a loan for me...   i am forever grateful.....she recently passed away, so my daughter Celine and i wish to help others in her memory..
lenders.occupational_info: I sell collectible musical instruments from America and Europe.

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because:
In the Philippines, where my family is from, 25 dollars is my cousin's salary for the month. This is used to feed, clothe, and care for his wife and toddler.  25 dollars is my share of dinner with friends. 

Money is so important.  There are many people in the world who have the potential to great things, if they just have the monetary backing.  

I loan because there are those out there who need this more than I.  My money goes to help entrepreneurs in other countries gain a better quality of life.

lenders.name: Albert & Sheila
lenders.loan_because: We wish to help others to have a better life and hopefully engender goodwill amongst all peoples

lenders.name: SF Crew
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of friends who want to help because we care.

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: I feel its great to help OTHER people!

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: To show that even a small amount may have some sort of impact, someone who works an average job can help. The money means more to them then I will ever know.
lenders.occupational_info: Calculations, numbers, dealing with people with all different personalities and trying to all get along and compromise.

lenders.name: Edd
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a great way to support equality in development
lenders.occupational_info: I teach about sexual health

lenders.name: Tobias
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help. People around can do good things with the cash.
lenders.occupational_info: I study plant growth. Plants are beautiful and useful. They start as tiny seeds, they take in water, they make leaves, roots, stems, flowers, with precise shapes. How do they do that? That is what I would like to know.

lenders.name: Rosalyn
lenders.loan_because: From those to whom much has been given, much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with youth at a community center outside of Managua, Nicaragua.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to want for nothing... so I'd like to share my "wealth" with others, especially with other women who are the heart and soul of a family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time Mom of three young cuties... living an exciting life in the suburbs (ha ha)

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I Can!  Every little bit that each one of us can do really does make a difference!  There are so many out there who are less fortunate, in terms of having enough money to fulfill their dreams... I am fortunate enough to be able to do the things that I dream about.  It only makes sense to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I educate children.  I teach them to read, to write, to open their minds, to learn, to grow, to challenge, to dream.

lenders.name: Alexis
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can and helping others always makes me happy.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help in a tangible way and I am an entrepeneuer as well!  I love that I can help someone with on the other side of the world in such a real way!
lenders.occupational_info: The most rewarding job in the world! I care for my son all day and also teach him at home - he is in first grade.  I do laundy, make meals, do dishes and keep the house clean.  I also have my own small business selling scrapbooking supplies and I love taking pictures of my friends and family!

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have the opportunity to succeed in their ventures no matter where they may live in the world.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I have been so blessed

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Kiva lets me be a fairy godmother on a small scale. Plus I have the joy of seeing where my money goes, and watching other people succeed. Kiva makes me happy.

lenders.name: Cécile
lenders.loan_because: I want to.
lenders.occupational_info: I study climate and how we might predict how it changes.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: it is my obligation as a sentient being.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to help people find their way through the maze of  life changes: debt, marriage, family, death, taxes, government.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I have an affluent life simply by luck of where I was born. Due to the imbalances of world economics, a donation that is easy for me to give makes a significant impact to someone across the world who needs it more. And the money goes direct to those who help themselves by their own enterprise, bypassing government mismanagement and corruption.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: It is a fabulous use of the power of the internet to directly make a difference in a "hands on" kind of way.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a training company called Corporate Heart International which assists executives bring more heart and soul to their dealings with others.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I think people helping each other makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am helping make new scientific equipment

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because:
Some folks would be happy
 just to have one dream come true. 
(....oh, and here's a hint: 
it's not a 72" flat screen TV)

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I believe in economic empowerment and the ability of individuals to connect across continents to enhance each other's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government in efforts to improve community health.  I am especially dedicated to women's health.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I want to try something new
lenders.occupational_info: Crunching numbers and then making decisions based on those numbers.

lenders.name: Paul Ng
lenders.loan_because: I believe that, in any way and any size, one should always return something back to the community/society/world that somehow directly or indirectly shaped who you are.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student studying business in Vancouver.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: working to support the microfinance industry I found a real way to help those willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide support to businesses utilizing information and communications technologies.

lenders.name: Angus
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I research and write about individuals and entire civilizations because  the story of humanity fascinates me.  The lens of history allows us to understand the modern world, but only if we are honest about the past.

lenders.name: donald
lenders.loan_because: I believe all people deserve the opportunity to improve their situation in life.  I am more than fortunate, to have been born in a nation in which dreams and ideas get to flourish without too many obstacles. If I can help someone attain their dreams,  or at least help them overcome the challenges they face, then I feel like I have accomplished something real and valuable.

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I believe we should all have the right to opportunity.  Opportunity is the keystone to success.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Like my cat I have a relatively comfortable life.  Lending amounts that are small to me but can usefully help these microprojects is, I hope, effective at helping those with less fat pet cats.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach economics, so this hopefully is putting practice into theory

lenders.name: Croker Cares
lenders.loan_because: we care!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a high school English class at an all-girls school in Nashville, Tennessee.

lenders.name: Daniel&Anna
lenders.loan_because: I know micro loans work. I've seen it with my own eyes and had the joy of giving out a small loan and see the business grow. God has created us to be productive and work, and sometimes we just need a little help from others to get some work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a team of 200+ Christians who train and equip some of the poorest of the poor in the Philippines. We teach sustainable natural farming, along with personal visioning, money management and a lot of other skills including primary health education and values.

lenders.name: benedict
lenders.loan_because: iam very keen to go far in my recharge cards resselling business which is a thriving one over here in Nigeria
lenders.occupational_info: i am the ceo of benad investments limited,a communications outfit that deals on recharge carrds of every denomination and phone accessories.i manage the business with my staff.

lenders.name: kerry
lenders.loan_because: i believe in independance through hard work and a bit of help to start.
lenders.occupational_info: retired mother of 5 children.

lenders.name: fred
lenders.loan_because: I should
lenders.occupational_info: retired from managing large complexes of computer systems

lenders.name: ifeanyi
lenders.loan_because: i am in need of money to giude me through my education
lenders.occupational_info: student

lenders.name: Weary traveller
lenders.loan_because: I've got plenty and travel a lot and see people who don't have enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I can't.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand.

lenders.name: duncan
lenders.loan_because: As a Christian I believe God gives me a responsibility to share His gifts to me with others. Jesus said "I am the Way, the Truth and the Life, no one comes to the Father except through me".

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: I think women are in an especially difficult position if it comes to getting loans and I would like to support women entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I am looking after advertising sales for an international business publication

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.occupation: Soon to be a student again! : )

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Analysing investment opportunities to help my clients make money

lenders.name: susan
lenders.loan_because: we are all God's children and we share what  we have

lenders.name: Justine
lenders.occupational_info: I am working as a Kiva Fellow in Malaba, Kenya, a small town on the border of Uganda. I, along with 5 other Brown University students composing a Students of the World team, will be making a documentary film on the work of Kiva with the MFI PEMCI.

lenders.name: Antonia
lenders.loan_because:
I feel connected to the person I loan and it makes me happy to help others to create a better life. I like the possibility to relend my money again and again. And last but not least I enjoy to be surrounded by wonderfully caring people from all over the
world :-)

lenders.name: Christophe
lenders.loan_because: globalization is for everyone

lenders.name: Carter
lenders.loan_because: I can and it helps others.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have a nice job and live in a lovely country. If everyone can help just one person, and in turn that person can help one more. Then the world would be a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a Law firm. I look after their computers and their technical needs

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: Developing financial IT solutions for large companies as well as my own company.

lenders.name: Abubacker-siddick
lenders.loan_because: To fund elders in my village who were organised in the name of ELDERS SELF HELP GROUP- Karaikudi, Tamilnadu. These 22 elders were aged  60 years and above with the motivation of making themselves employed with Garment making, fibre rope making etc.
lenders.occupational_info: Social worker interested in helping children who need good education and elders who need someone for their food.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: It helps.
lenders.occupational_info: Support and sale of work by artists.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in helping people better their lives --it is the least I can do, as I have a wonderful life!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Mom. I once worked as a teacher in Newark, NJ, for 7 years, then worked at home as a Mom, then managed a gift shop for 10 years.

lenders.name: raf sanchez
lenders.loan_because: the disparities between rich and poor are getting ever greater.  Whilst I do donate to charities, I would like to be able to help entrepreneurial individuals in a real and immediate way and kiva.org appears to be a great way to do this.

lenders.name: Margot
lenders.loan_because: Our world economic system is unjust. And I want to help in a respectful way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a safe house for women and children fleeing a violent home situation, and also as a waitress serving food at a restaurant on the beach

lenders.name: Scott Carbone
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.occupational_info: Technical Sales Professional

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I have been so very fortunate in my life and I feel it is God's wish that I help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired law-enforcement officer and I have seen first hand what a little help can do to change a person's life.

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to start and grow their businesses

lenders.name: Josep Ll.
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs financial help sometime.However, we all have dreamed of getting loans with no interest and that if we really can't pay they can be condoned. Kiva allows me to lend directly to the entrepreneurs, so I am happy to take the opportunity.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: Years ago I wrote training materials for the Kenya Women Finance Trust and met wonderful people. Now, through KIVA, we can enable others to follow their dreams even if we can't be there with them.
lenders.occupational_info: I have retired after many years as a staff member at a university and now love to read and travel.

lenders.name: Marijn
lenders.loan_because: I have enough and money should be used.

lenders.name: Konstantinos
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people, it's more fun than anything else.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very interesting and fulfilling, have spare time to do things I like

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: Unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required.

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupational_info: Divorce Lawyer

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: I have so much more than the people on these pages and can easily afford to help out and make a difference.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: these vibrant, BOP-country entrepreneurs are the torchbearers of responsible business.  They make money to feed their families and make their corner of the world a better place -- not to buy Ferraris.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate and want to be able to give to others who may not be as lucky as myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people improve their lives by improving their health and fitness.

lenders.name: Dean
lenders.loan_because: Gov'ts aren't doing enough, so individuals have to step in. Enough individuals can make a difference!

lenders.name: Thomas Mayer
lenders.loan_because: Making a positive difference in the world, one 25 dollar loan at the time.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.occupation: Mom First/ Illustrator on the side
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: If I kept the money in my pocket, I'd just spend it on something silly.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit all day in a cubicle and gaze out the window, wishing I was there with the borrower, fishing or selling my wares in a market, rather than watching myself grow old.

lenders.name: Sven & Katharina
lenders.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur at heart and like to see businesses flurish
lenders.occupational_info: Sven: Branch Manager for retail bank; Katharina: MD/Researcher in public health

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people develop their full life potential.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: My ancestors are from Eastern Poland/Western Ukraine. My family has been increasingly successful in the ~4 generations that we've been in the US, so I see this as a small way of giving back to my original homeland.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an assistant professor in biology at a small state college in Massachusetts.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: We need to start somewhere in helping people who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I organise the installation of computers and telephones

lenders.name: juan
lenders.loan_because: hola quiero un prestamos para el apiario y asi producir mas
lenders.occupational_info: el`prestamas puede ser de 1.000.00 dolares gracias

lenders.name: Adrienne and Michael
lenders.occupational_info: Michael is a photographer,  fine cabinet maker and artist.  Adrienne is a writer and small business owner who started her now successful  business on a very small budget so I know how far a few hundred dollars can go!
